39: וְכִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יָמ֥וּךְ <sup>4134 </sup> <n>[that dwelleth] by thee be waxen poor</n> אָחִ֛יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>And if thy brother</n> עִמָּ֖ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>regard</n> וְנִמְכַּר־ <sup>4376 </sup> <n>and be sold</n> לָ֑ךְ לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תַעֲבֹ֥ד <sup>5647 </sup> <n>unto thee thou shalt not compel</n> בּ֖וֹ עֲבֹ֥דַת <sup>5656 </sup> <n>him to serve</n> עָֽבֶד׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>as a bondservant</n>

41: וְיָצָא֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And [then] shall he depart</n> מֵֽעִמָּ֔ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וּבָנָ֣יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>from thee [both] he and his children</n> עִמּ֑וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> וְשָׁב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>with him and shall return</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> מִשְׁפַּחְתּ֔וֹ <sup>4940 </sup> <n>unto his own family</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֲחֻזַּ֥ת <sup>272 </sup> <n>and unto the possession</n> אֲבֹתָ֖יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>of his fathers</n> יָשֽׁוּב׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall he return</n>
42: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עֲבָדַ֣י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>For they [are] my servants</n> הֵ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <sup>3318 </sup> <n>which I brought forth</n> אֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> יִמָּכְר֖וּ <sup>4376 </sup> <n>they shall not be sold</n> מִמְכֶּ֥רֶת <sup>4466 </sup> <n>as</n> עָֽבֶד׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>bondmen</n>
43: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִרְדֶּ֥ה <sup>7287 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not rule</n> ב֖וֹ בְּפָ֑רֶךְ <sup>6531 </sup> <n>over him with rigour</n> וְיָרֵ֖אתָ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>but shalt fear</n> מֵאֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n>
44: וְעַבְדְּךָ֥ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>Both thy bondmen</n> וַאֲמָתְךָ֖ <sup>519 </sup> <n>and thy bondmaids</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> יִהְיוּ־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>may have</n> לָ֑ךְ מֵאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>which thou shalt have [shall be] of the heathen</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>5439 </sup> <n>that are round about</n> מֵהֶ֥ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> תִּקְנ֖וּ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>you of them shall ye buy</n> עֶ֥בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>bondmen</n> וְאָמָֽה׃ <sup>519 </sup> <n>and bondmaids</n>
45: וְ֠גַם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>too</n> מִבְּנֵ֨י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Moreover of the children</n> הַתּוֹשָׁבִ֜ים <sup>8453 </sup> <n>of the strangers</n> הַגָּרִ֤ים <sup>1481 </sup> <n>that do sojourn</n> עִמָּכֶם֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>among</n> מֵהֶ֣ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>that</n> תִּקְנ֔וּ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>among you of them shall ye buy</n> וּמִמִּשְׁפַּחְתָּם֙ <sup>4940 </sup> <n>and of their families</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עִמָּכֶ֔ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>among</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הוֹלִ֖ידוּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>that [are] with you which they begat</n> בְּאַרְצְכֶ֑ם <sup>776 </sup> <n>in your land</n> וְהָי֥וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>may become</n> לָכֶ֖ם לַֽאֲחֻזָּֽה׃ <sup>272 </sup> <n>and they shall be your possession</n>
46: וְהִתְנַחֲלְתֶּ֨ם <sup>5157 </sup> <n>And ye shall take them as an inheritance</n> אֹתָ֜ם <sup>853 </sup> לִבְנֵיכֶ֤ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for your children</n> אַחֲרֵיכֶם֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>3423 </sup> <n>you to inherit</n> אֲחֻזָּ֔ה <sup>272 </sup> <n>[them for] a possession</n> לְעֹלָ֖ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> בָּהֶ֣ם תַּעֲבֹ֑דוּ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>they shall be your bondmen</n> וּבְאַ֨חֵיכֶ֤ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>but over your brethren</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>one</n> בְּאָחִ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>over another</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִרְדֶּ֥ה <sup>7287 </sup> <n>ye shall not rule</n> ב֖וֹ בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ <sup>6531 </sup> <n>with rigour</n> ס
47: וְכִ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>now if</n> תַשִּׂ֗יג <sup>5381 </sup> <n>wax rich</n> יַ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by thee</n> גֵּ֤ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>And if a sojourner</n> וְתוֹשָׁב֙ <sup>8453 </sup> <n>or stranger</n> עִמָּ֔ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>regard</n> וּמָ֥ךְ <sup>4134 </sup> <n>[that dwelleth] by him wax poor</n> אָחִ֖יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>and thy brother</n> עִמּ֑וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>regard</n> וְנִמְכַּ֗ר <sup>4376 </sup> <n>and sell</n> לְגֵ֤ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>himself unto the stranger</n> תּוֹשָׁב֙ <sup>8453 </sup> <n>[or] sojourner</n> עִמָּ֔ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>regard</n> א֥וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> לְעֵ֖קֶר <sup>6133 </sup> <n>by thee or to the stock</n> מִשְׁפַּ֥חַת <sup>4940 </sup> <n>family</n> גֵּֽר׃ <sup>1616 </sup> <n>of the stranger's</n>
48: אַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>After</n> נִמְכַּ֔ר <sup>4376 </sup> <n>that he is sold</n> גְּאֻלָּ֖ה <sup>1353 </sup> <n>he may be redeemed again</n> תִּהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall have</n> לּ֑וֹ אֶחָ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>one</n> מֵאֶחָ֖יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>of his brethren</n> יִגְאָלֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>may redeem</n>
49: אוֹ־ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> דֹד֞וֹ <sup>1730 </sup> <n>Either his uncle</n> א֤וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> דֹּדוֹ֙ <sup>1730 </sup> <n>or his uncle's</n> יִגְאָלֶ֔נּוּ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>may redeem</n> אֽוֹ־ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> מִשְּׁאֵ֧ר <sup>7607 </sup> <n>him or [any] that is nigh</n> בְּשָׂר֛וֹ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>of kin</n> מִמִּשְׁפַּחְתּ֖וֹ <sup>4940 </sup> <n>unto him of his family</n> יִגְאָלֶ֑נּוּ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>may redeem</n> אֽוֹ־ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> הִשִּׂ֥יגָה <sup>5381 </sup> <n>him or if he be able</n> יָד֖וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>himself</n> וְנִגְאָֽל׃ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>he may redeem</n>
50: וְחִשַּׁב֙ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>And he shall reckon</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> קֹנֵ֔הוּ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>with him that bought</n> מִשְּׁנַת֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>him from the year</n> הִמָּ֣כְרוֹ <sup>4376 </sup> <n>that he was sold</n> ל֔וֹ עַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>up</n> שְׁנַ֣ת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>to him unto the year</n> הַיֹּבֵ֑ל <sup>3104 </sup> <n>of jubile</n> וְהָיָ֞ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall correspond</n> כֶּ֤סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>and the price</n> מִמְכָּרוֹ֙ <sup>4465 </sup> <n>of his sale</n> בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <sup>4557 </sup> <n>shall be according unto the number</n> שָׁנִ֔ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>of years</n> כִּימֵ֥י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>according to the time</n> שָׂכִ֖יר <sup>7916 </sup> <n>of an hired servant</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall correspond</n> עִמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
51: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> ע֥וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>are still</n> רַבּ֖וֹת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>If [there be] yet many</n> בַּשָּׁנִ֑ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> לְפִיהֶן֙ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>[behind] according</n> יָשִׁ֣יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>unto them he shall give again</n> גְּאֻלָּת֔וֹ <sup>1353 </sup> <n>the price of his redemption</n> מִכֶּ֖סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>out of the money</n> מִקְנָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>4736 </sup> <n>that he was bought</n>
52: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>and if</n> מְעַ֞ט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>but few</n> נִשְׁאַ֧ר <sup>7604 </sup> <n>And if there remain</n> בַּשָּׁנִ֛ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> שְׁנַ֥ת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>unto the year</n> הַיֹּבֵ֖ל <sup>3104 </sup> <n>of jubile</n> וְחִשַּׁב־ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>then he shall count</n> ל֑וֹ כְּפִ֣י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>with him [and] according</n> שָׁנָ֔יו <sup>8141 </sup> <n>unto his years</n> יָשִׁ֖יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall he give him again</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּאֻלָּתֽוֹ׃ <sup>1353 </sup> <n>the price of his redemption</n>
53: כִּשְׂכִ֥יר <sup>7916 </sup> <n>hired servant</n> שָׁנָ֛ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> בְּשָׁנָ֖ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> יִהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עִמּ֑וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יִרְדֶּ֥נּֽוּ <sup>7287 </sup> <n>shall he be with him [and the other] shall not rule</n> בְּפֶ֖רֶךְ <sup>6531 </sup> <n>with rigour</n> לְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>over him in thy sight</n>
54: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> יִגָּאֵ֖ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>And if he be not redeemed</n> בְּאֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> וְיָצָא֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>in these [years] then he shall go out</n> בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>in the year</n> הַיֹּבֵ֔ל <sup>3104 </sup> <n>of jubile</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וּבָנָ֥יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[both] he and his children</n> עִמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
55: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לִ֤י בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>For unto me the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עֲבָדִ֔ים <sup>5650 </sup> <n>[are] servants</n> עֲבָדַ֣י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>they [are] my servants</n> הֵ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <sup>3318 </sup> <n>whom I brought forth</n> אוֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n>
